page.title: 05GUNTON HALL HOLIDAY CAMP
page.content: Approximately 640 people can be accommodated at Gunton Hall Holiday Camp.It is situated on the A12 between Lowestoft and Great Yarmouth. Adult activities include:-snooker,bars, gym.,squash and table-tennis. Childrens activities include:-playing areas,log cabins and swimming. One important rule is that no pets or animals are allowed on the site.The staff employed by the camp number 200 during the summer season and about 50 for the rest of the year.The holiday season can run for 22 weeks and the camp is also used in the "closed" season for other activities.A big advantage for the camp is that the beach is only a short walk from the site.
